nodes.text: The Bombing of the Smuggler's Run occurred in 17 ABY when Kueller detonated the bombs hidden in droids bound for Coruscant. As all the droids there had been deactivated, the only ones that blew up were the ones on Smuggler's Run, that were going to be smuggled there. The bombing cause damage to Skip 1 and killed many smugglers there. Han Solo speculated that similar things had happened in other Skips on the Run.
